p: The objective of the study was to determine the antibacterial, antioxidant and cytotoxic effects of garden cress polysaccharide. Molecular characteristics and chemical compositions using FT-IR specify the main sugars such a as fructose, arabinose, glucose, rhamnose, uronic acid and galactose, which admits the polyelectrolyte existence to the GC seed extract ( Karazhiyan et al., 2011).
